name: Thoracolumbar Spine AO Injury Classification on CT (TLICS)
description: Thoracolumbar Spine AO Injury Classification on CT (TLICS)

attributes.name: Type of injury
attributes.description: Type A: Compression A0 Minor, nonstructural (TP or spinous process) A1 wedge, no post wall A2 split, both endplates A3 partial burst-post wall + 1 endplate A4 burst - post wall + both endplates Type B: Tension band injury B1 Transosseous tension band (Chance fx) B2 Posterior tension band (hyperflexion) B3 Anterior tension band (hyperextension) Type C: Subluxation, translation

attributes.name: Modifiers
attributes.description: M1 Indeterminate injury to tension band based on imaging M2 Patient specific comorbidity (e.g. Ankylosing spondylitis, burns, etc...)

index_codes.display: thoracolumbar spine ao injury classification on ct (tlics)
